overview: Sinamorata is a DVD by doom metal band My Dying Bride, produced in 2005. The DVD contains two promotional video clips, another two clips created by My Dying Bride fans plus live video cuts and art galleries of live images, band images and fan-made artwork. Also, the DVD has live footage from a Hof Ter Lo performance in Antwerp, November 2003.
tagline: Live in Hof Ter Lo, Antwerpen, Belgium, nov/2003 (12 tracks) + videoclips (2 tracks) + fan videos (2 tracks) + fan art
title: My Dying Bride: Sinamorata
